mlDocs.author: Bhikkhu Sujato

an5.89:1.3.pli: Kammārāmatā, bhassārāmatā, niddārāmatā, saṅgaṇikārāmatā, yathāvimuttaṁ cittaṁ na paccavekkhati—
an5.89:1.3.en: They relish work, talk, sleep, and company. And they don’t review the extent of their mind’s freedom.

an5.89:2.3.pli: Na kammārāmatā, na bhassārāmatā, na niddārāmatā, na saṅgaṇikārāmatā, yathāvimuttaṁ cittaṁ paccavekkhati—
an5.89:2.3.en: They don’t relish work, talk, sleep, and company. And they review the extent of their mind’s freedom.

mlDocs.title:
Numbered Discourses 5.89
9. Senior Mendicants
A Trainee (1st)

mlDocs.author: Bhikkhu Sujato

an5.149:1.3.pli: Kammārāmatā, bhassārāmatā, niddārāmatā, saṅgaṇikārāmatā, yathāvimuttaṁ cittaṁ na paccavekkhati.
an5.149:1.3.en: They relish work, talk, sleep, and company. And they don’t review the extent of their mind’s freedom.

an5.149:2.3.pli: Na kammārāmatā, na bhassārāmatā, na niddārāmatā, na saṅgaṇikārāmatā, yathāvimuttaṁ cittaṁ paccavekkhati.
an5.149:2.3.en: They don’t relish work, talk, sleep, and company. And they review the extent of their mind’s freedom.

mlDocs.title:
Numbered Discourses 5.149
15. At Tikaṇḍakī
Temporarily Free (1st)

an6.31:1.3.pli: Kammārāmatā, bhassārāmatā, niddārāmatā, saṅgaṇikārāmatā, indriyesu aguttadvāratā, bhojane amattaññutā—
an6.31:1.3.en: They relish work, talk, sleep, and company. They don’t guard the sense doors, and they eat too much.

an6.31:2.3.pli: Na kammārāmatā, na bhassārāmatā, na niddārāmatā, na saṅgaṇikārāmatā, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā—
an6.31:2.3.en: They don’t relish work, talk, sleep, and company. They guard the sense doors, and they don’t eat too much.

an8.79:1.3.pli: Kammārāmatā, bhassārāmatā, niddārāmatā, saṅgaṇikārāmatā, indriyesu aguttadvāratā, bhojane amattaññutā, saṁsaggārāmatā, papañcārāmatā—
an8.79:1.3.en: They relish work, talk, sleep, and company. They don’t guard the sense doors and they eat too much. They relish closeness and proliferation.

an8.79:2.3.pli: Na kammārāmatā, na bhassārāmatā, na niddārāmatā, na saṅgaṇikārāmatā, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, asaṁsaggārāmatā, nippapañcārāmatā—
an8.79:2.3.en: They don’t relish work, talk, sleep and company. They guard the sense doors, and they don’t eat too much. They don’t relish closeness and proliferation.

mlDocs.author: Bhikkhu Sujato

an7.28:1.6.pli: Kammārāmatā, bhassārāmatā, niddārāmatā, saṅgaṇikārāmatā, indriyesu aguttadvāratā, bhojane amattaññutā, santi kho pana saṅghe saṅghakaraṇīyāni; tatra sekho bhikkhu iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an7.28:1.6.en: They relish work, talk, sleep, and company. They don’t guard the sense doors and they eat too much. And when there is Saṅgha business to be carried out, they don’t reflect:

an7.28:2.3.pli: Na kammārāmatā, na bhassārāmatā, na niddārāmatā, na saṅgaṇikārāmatā, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, santi kho pana saṅghe saṅghakaraṇīyāni; tatra sekho bhikkhu iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an7.28:2.3.en: They don’t relish work, talk, sleep, and company. They guard the sense doors and don’t eat too much. And when there is Saṅgha business to be carried out, they reflect:

mlDocs.title:
Numbered Discourses 7.28
3. The Vajji Seven
Non-decline for a Mendicant Trainee

mlDocs.author: Bhikkhu Sujato

an5.150:1.3.pli: Kammārāmatā, bhassārāmatā, niddārāmatā, indriyesu aguttadvāratā, bhojane amattaññutā.
an5.150:1.3.en: They relish work, talk, and sleep. They don’t guard the sense doors and they eat too much.

an5.150:2.3.pli: Na kammārāmatā, na bhassārāmatā, na niddārāmatā, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā.
an5.150:2.3.en: They don’t relish work, talk, and sleep. They guard the sense doors and they have moderation in eating.

mlDocs.title:
Numbered Discourses 5.150
15. At Tikaṇḍakī
Temporarily Free (2nd)

mlDocs.author: Bhikkhu Sujato

an7.24:2.1.pli: Yāvakīvañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhū na kammārāmā bhavissanti, na kammaratā, na kammārāmataṁ anuyuttā; vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṁ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni.
an7.24:2.1.en: As long as the mendicants don’t relish work, loving it and liking to relish it, they can expect growth, not decline.

mlDocs.title:
Numbered Discourses 7.24
3. The Vajji Seven
Non-Decline for Mendicants (2nd)

mlDocs.author: Bhikkhu Sujato

an6.14:5.1.pli: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu na kammārāmo hoti na kammarato na kammārāmataṁ anuyutto, na bhassārāmo hoti na bhassarato na bhassārāmataṁ anuyutto, na niddārāmo hoti na niddārato na niddārāmataṁ anuyutto, na saṅgaṇikārāmo hoti na saṅgaṇikarato na saṅgaṇikārāmataṁ anuyutto, na saṁsaggārāmo hoti na saṁsaggarato na saṁsaggārāmataṁ anuyutto, na papañcārāmo hoti na papañcarato na papañcārāmataṁ anuyutto.
an6.14:5.1.en: Take a mendicant who doesn’t relish work, talk, sleep, company, closeness, and proliferation. They don’t love these things or like to relish them.

mlDocs.title:
Numbered Discourses 6.14
2. Warm-hearted
A Good Death

an6.15:4.1.pli: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu na kammārāmo hoti na kammarato na kammārāmataṁ anuyutto, na bhassārāmo hoti …
an6.15:4.1.en: Take a mendicant who doesn’t relish work, talk, sleep, company, closeness, and proliferation. They don’t love these things or like to relish them.

iti79:3.3.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu na kammārāmo hoti, na kammarato, na kammārāmatamanuyutto;
iti79:3.3.en: It’s when a mendicant doesn’t relish work,

mlDocs.author: Bhikkhu Sujato

dn16:1.7.4.pli: “Yāvakīvañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhū na kammārāmā bhavissanti na kammaratā na kammārāmatamanuyuttā, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṁ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni.
dn16:1.7.4.en: As long as the mendicants don’t relish work, loving it and liking to relish it, they can expect growth, not decline.
